column3: “Makes you feel productive and energetic without anxiety and paranoia which is nice.  (I already have an anxiety disorder, so I would highly recommend this strain to anyone else struggling with anxiety, in general too) :)”
“aka Blood Orange Tangie, packs a sativa punch loaded with sweet purpley lavender terps”

“Very unique tangy flavor and appearance. The taste is almost perfumed, buds are not too dense and gorgeous purple mixed with orange and green hairs. Glistening trichomes. Positively sativa style buzz.  Medium strength, very creative and up. I haven't seen or tasted anything quite like it in a while- after a few days of medicating with purple tangie I had to go back to get another 8th. I'm now saving it for special oc...”
“Amazing Terp profile, and best day time smoke around. Very awaking, and motivating, can be a little Speedy. Always have a True purple color. 🔥💜👍👌 one of a kind Cannabis, a must try.”

“After taking WAY too big of a hit of this and sleeping like a baby that night, I woke up feeling refreshed, uncluttered and pretty damn good, overall. I felt good enough to sweep and mop my whole place, which was awesome.”
“Favorite strain! Best daytime and nighttime med! Works for all my medical conditions.”

“Sweet and slightly flowery, Purple Tangie makes me happy, literally. I feel relaxed and blissful, as if everything is right in the world. I no longer feel irritated and appalled by my Facebook feed. Thanks, Purple Tangie!”

“It's good nice warm buzz like high,focused ... When you want to smoke purps but don't want that heavy indica high ..smoke some Purple Tangie it's sativa side counters the sleepy effects to a level where you feel relaxed and chill but not couch locked.”
“Euforia a raudales y su olor color y aspecto es de las mejores sativas para mí.”

“I don't have anything negative to say about this strain. The taste and smell are a combo of sweet citrus and funky skunk (which happens to be my ideal terp profile) and the cerebral buzz keeps me going for hours! 
The buds are a beautiful green with purple tips and orange hairs! Looking good enough to eat, but I think I'll just smoke it all instead 😍”
“absolutly amazing! Defiantly a motivating strain!”

“The buds are nice and chunky. I noticed a lot orange hairs. When you smell the bud it almost smells like a orchid. When you break the bud down, it has a great pine scent which gives the user a preview of what is to come. Very deceiving. I took 3 tokes and began to feel the effects.  Relieved a headache I had, increased my appetite and gave me the motivation to write this review.”

“Purple Tangie gives me a quick head high that starts out as a buzz and melts into a warm hugging feeling across my forehead. Too much gives me a headache, though. Otherwise, I feel happy and relaxed.”

“Purple Tangie is an exemplary Sativa in both its form and function. This spicy, minty, and potently citrusy flower is epic. The large, golden trichome COVERED buds are accented by deep dark purple sugar leaves. It's Tangie - Skunk heritage is evident once any stash of this is opened, overtaking the space with notes of orange liqueur and dankness. The high is stratospheric yet very clear, making you extremely talkativ...”
“pretty good, but an euphoric feelings are short lived. but a great taste, smell and overall experience.”

“It may be said that my experience with this particular strain was only with a single pre roll. 
This strain has a flavor profile very close to it’s very name. A gentle stream of citrus stimulates the palate. The aroma is warm and enveloping. Given some time, a sticky residue will begin to coat your lips with orange like flavors. However, the high itself is rather insignificant. There is little to describe beyond that...”
“pretty good, but an euphoric feelings are short lived. but a great taste, smell and overall experience.”

“best sativa I've had in over a month. the smell was super passionfruity and the buds were purple inside and out. very functional strain when smoking smaller amount, but over a gram at once and this strain leaves me feeling bent.”
“decent strain. absolutely worth the try.”
“Awesome”
“Made me very calm with a smile on my face, wanting to listen to more Dead & Company!”
“It helps me when I'm sad or mad”

“This strain knocked me om my butt! I was expecting an uplifting and racy Sativa high, but for me it was more like a heavy hitting Indica....It looks so pretty with the purple colors and sparkly buds and a pleasant earthy orange citrus spice kinda flavor...I experienced an intense high and blurred vision, euphoria was soon given way to sleepiness. I took a nap and woke up with a neck headache. Not sure if this will be...”
“hella dry mouth”
“Me and my niggas smoking this right now , and I gotta say this shit is BOMB. I'm a sativa lover , I give this a billiin”

“The buds are nice and chunky. I noticed a lot orange hairs. When you smell the bud it almost smells like a orchid. When you break the bud down, it has a great pine scent which gives the user a preview of what is to come. Very deceiving. I took 3 tokes and began to feel the effects.  Relieved a headache I had, increased my appetite and gave me the motivation to write this review.”
“A really good taste with some lemon and red fruits aroma”
“Def a fruitful taste. just wish the high was a little bit longer but overall amazing.”
“my favorite strain of all time. definitely a unique flavor, tasty!”
“smokes great..power packing smell..and great texture...good buds...”
“Definitely a get shit done smoke. Highly focused, full of energy, and no munchies for me!”
“love the color taste and high 4 outa 5”

“Had the honor of trying the Purple Tangie - LAK Cartridge L6 from Los Angeles Kush (LAK). Purple Tangie will give you a boost of energy and make you focused, all without any Anxiety/Paranoia. Keep in mind everything from LAK is hella potent.”

“One of the most flavorful strains I've come across. I picked up some Orange Tangie from Purple Star MD in San Francisco at the management's insistence, and I can't stop raving about it.

The buds smell have an overpowering tangerine aroma with subtle hints of grape. The smoke is sweet and citrusy, with plenty of tangerine flavor that gives way to red fruit on the exhale. This strain gave a balanced high reflective of...”
“A super earthy flavour I had never tasted before . Chilled but not tired or sleepy, perfect for daytime use.”

“OK, I am giving this strain five stars because it is an excellent sativa that does exactly what it should do. However, as someone who struggles with anxiety and an abundance of energy this was a concentrator I had to be very careful with… And the cartridge at 1 g from LA Kush ended up lasting over a month because of how slowly I used it. One or two heads would absolutely fill a person with an insane amount of energy,...”
“one of my favorite strains, it's amazing meekness me feel invincible and energetic”

“I absolutely hate this strain, I've given it multiple chance's to change my opinion on it because  it has great reviews, but I've found I have to smoke so much to feel anything and the high doesn't last long.”
